entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then north 30 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 59 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
